contact.title: Let's chat!
contact.description: Feel free to reach out if you want to chat about tech, accessibility, performance, or UX - I'm always happy to connect!
contact.messageAnswer: Don't worry - you'll always get a personal reply from me!

formValidation.name-min-length: Name must be at least 2 characters
formValidation.message-min-length: Message must be at least 10 characters

contact.thank-you-message: Thank you for reaching out. I'll get back to you soon.
contact.error-message: Error sending message. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Oops! look like you found a mysterious path. Let's get out of here.

home.text: Hello! I'm Samuel Nakazawa and this is my website :)
